profile.profileName: [Limerick City Museum, Limerick, Ireland (UPDATE)] Museum collection
profile.profileDescription: This profile configures CollectiveAccess for use as a museum collections catalogue

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative description. This is the primary text used to document the item.

label.name: Brief description
label.description: Brief description. This is the text used to document the item in space constrained areas.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of item description. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Geographic place name (via GeoNames authority)
label.description: Controlled place name from GeoNames (http://www.geonames.org) authority

label.name: Notes (internal use only)
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.

label.name: Alternate identifiers
label.description: List alternate identifiers here. These are alphanumeric codes used at some point to identify the object which are no longer employed.

label.name: Rights &amp; restrictions
label.description: Narrative description of rights held and/or restrictions under which the item is bound.

label.name: Location description
label.description: Narrative description of item location. The location of an item should be recorded using the storage location hierarchy. This narrative field is a hold-over from the earlier CollectiveAccess 0.5x system and will eventually be removed.

label.name: Physical dimensions
label.description: Dimensions of item as text for display.

label.name: Copyright date
label.description: Date of copyright for this object.

label.name: Period
label.description: Period in which object was created.

label.name: Object category
label.description: Classification for object

label.name: Dynasty
label.description: Dynasty in which object was created.

label.name: Century
label.description: Century in which object was created.

label.name: Period of loan
label.description: Enter the start and end dates of the loan. Ex. 30/6/2010 - 15/03/2011</i>

label.name: Temporary location
label.description: Enter the location of the item during the this period here.

label.name: Period of storage
label.description: Enter the start and end dates of the storage. Ex. 30/6/2010 - 15/03/2011</i>

label.name: Verified by
label.description: Name or initials of the person who verified the location of the item.

label.name: Notes
label.description: Enter any additional information about this storage event here.

label.name: Permanent location
label.description: Location where the object is normally stored.

label.name: Library of Congress subject headings
label.description: Subject headings taken from the Library of Congress (US) subject heading authority at http://id.loc.gov

label.name: Attribution
label.description: i.e. author of opinion

label.name: Acquisition Method
label.description: Method of acquisition.

label.name: Acquisition Price
label.description: Price of acquisition.

label.name: Acquisition Date
label.description: Date of acquisition.

label.name: Acquisition Amount
label.description: Amount of value.

label.name: Provenance
label.description: The history of the ownership and transmission of an object, including previous locations of a work.

label.name: Date Received
label.description: Enter the date the object was received.

label.name: Deaccession Method
label.description: Method of deaccession.

label.name: Date Deaccessed
label.description: Enter the date the object was deaccessed.

label.name: Date started
label.description: The date when conservation treatment started.

label.name: Date completed
label.description: The date when conservation treatement was completed.

label.name: Portrait
label.description: Portrait of person

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Institution
label.description: Name of the institution to which the collection belongs.
